title: Bloomberg Law: Erik Larson on GM (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg Law: Erik Larson on GM (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Erik Larson, Bloomberg News U.S. Legal Reporter, will discuss how a trust to handle General Motor's bankruptcy claims is close to a $15 million settlement. He speaks with June Grasso and Greg Stohr on "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
